entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
